Nov. 19, 2005 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-third-section
Test Piece Contest
Pennine Moors
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Flugel, Pontypool. Best horn section - Radyr and Morganstown. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed
March 26, 2011, 1:18 p.m. July 2, 2020, 11:07 a.m.
1 Pontypool Brass Jonathan Pippen
2 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Ritter
3 Llwydcoed Band Alan Davies
4 Oakdale Silver Band Ron Probyn
5 Crwbin Silver Band Julian Jones
6 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
7 Newport Borough Band Mike Davies
